xtc.lang.cpp

Interface Actions.Context

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CParsingContext
    Enclosing class:
    Actions

    public static interface Actions.Context
    The context interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Actions.Context fork()
      Fork this context.
      void free()
      Free any memory this context may be using.
      boolean mayMerge(Actions.Context other)
      Determine whether this context can merge with another.

      Merge this context with another.

      boolean shouldReclassify(Collection<xtc.lang.cpp.ForkMergeParser.Lookahead> set)
      Determine whether the follow-set needs reclassification.

    • Method Detail

      • fork

        Actions.Context fork()
        Fork this context. This method is invoked on regular fork operations but not on fork operations due to context.
        Returns:
        The forked context.

      • shouldReclassify

        boolean shouldReclassify(Collection<xtc.lang.cpp.ForkMergeParser.Lookahead> set)
        Determine whether the follow-set needs reclassification. The parser only class reclassify if this method returns true. Therefore, this method should be faster than reclassify, which will improve parser performance.
        Parameters:
        set - The follow-set.
        Returns:
        true If the follow-set needs reclassification.

      • reclassify

        Collection<xtc.lang.cpp.ForkMergeParser.Lookahead> reclassify(Collection<xtc.lang.cpp.ForkMergeParser.Lookahead> set)
        Given the follow-set, reclassify tokens in the set and return any new tokens that result from implicit conditionals, e.g. the typedef/var name ambiguity in C. Do not add tokens the follow-set.
        Parameters:
        set - The follow-set.
        Returns:
        Any new tokens or null if there are none.

      • mayMerge

        boolean mayMerge(Actions.Context other)
        Determine whether this context can merge with another. This method is invoked on merge candidates that already observe the merge discipline (modulo context).
        Parameters:
        other - The other context.
        Returns:
        true if the contexts may merge.

      • merge

        Actions.Context merge(Actions.Context other)
        Merge this context with another.
        Parameters:
        other - The other context.
        Returns:
        The merged context.

      • free

        void free()
        Free any memory this context may be using.
